title: my lol fan art.

embed.description: The latest Tweets from 달파란/青月 (@bmhalo). [ graphic designer , Illustrator ] / 한국어, English, 日本語/ F, U, B Free / 행사 참가 정보 및 그림 업로드, 관글, 리트윗이 주가되는 구독용 계정 / 최근 관심사 LOL /

body:
I'm illustrators from korea, and i really like lol.
I was drawing this picture recently. I'll hope you like my picture.
If you like my picture please visit my twitter and follow me :) thx

p.s looking for good sup partner.
NA : TheBeelzebub

replies.body:
These are beautiful!  They have such a soft, magical, feeling to them.  They are really lovely - thank you so much for sharing them.

Google translate follows:
다음은 아름답다 ! 그들은 그들에게 같은 부드러운 , 마법 , 느낌이 . 그들은 정말 사랑스러운 - 을 공유하는 당신에게 너무 감사합니다.

haha thx for using google translated XD next time。
next time draw more picture, i'll upload this page :)
oh god.. that Fizz x Nami slayed me so hard
You and me both! It's so fucking cute.
These works are amazing.

The characters and the poros already look amazing, but then I see how much work you've put into the background with all the vibrant colors and detail.. My favorite would have to be the one with Fizz and Nami, the way the water reflects and everything is so great! Theses drawings are really amazing.
Nice, I love it :)
haha thx XD
These are really really cute! Would you mind if i shared these with my friends?  ( 이들은 정말 정말 귀엽다 ! 난 내 친구들과 이 공유 하는 경우 될까요 ?) I think i did that right {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I love your style! Traits aren't totally defined and give this nice messy feeling along with the softness of the piece. Waiting for more!
The fizz one almost makes me not want to hate fizz
ur mind is so wonderful

When i saw the fizz i thought it was also an auroras.

Excellent work though. <3
Awesome!
FIZZ AND NAMI SO CUTEEEEEE OMGOMGOGMG
I especially love the coloring. Great job!
Great job! These are really good
The sona one is amazing.
Man I love that Teemo! He looks more like a fox this time which is cool compared to the rest of other people's fanarts of Teemo.

Really great work!

I love em all, but the Gragas and Gnar one gets my vote for best :D
Poros!
